channel.title: Don't like leaving your passwords showing in scripts?

item.title: Don't like leaving your passwords showing in scripts?
item.dc:creator: @Scartastic Scartastic
item.source: Don't like leaving your passwords showing in scripts?

item.title: Don't like leaving your passwords showing in scripts?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

You know when a script asks for your password and you think, do I really want to type my password here for everyone to see? Well use this to get the character codes then paste it in. Oh and this won’t work with constants.

var
   x: integer; strx,stry: string;
begin
ClearDebug;
strx:= 'martin';
for x:=1 to Length(strx) do
    begin
    writeln(Strx[x]+' - '+IntToStr(getKeyCode(strx[x])));
    end;
for x:=1 to Length(strx) do
    begin
    stry:=stry+'Chr('+IntToStr(getKeyCode(strx[x]))+')+';
    end;
    delete(stry,length(stry),1);
    writeln(stry);
    
//writeln(Chr(77)+Chr(65)+Chr(82)+Chr(84)+Chr(73)+Chr(78)); //Just to prove.
end.

[/lame]

Read full topic
